snippet: The leader, Dallin H. Oaks, also urged Mormons to be gracious and understanding of others with different views.
abstract: High-ranking Mormon leader Dallin H Oaks reiterates church's opposition to same-sex marriage, but urges members to be gracious toward those with different beliefs.
lead_paragraph: The leader, Dallin H. Oaks, also urged Mormons to be gracious and understanding of others with different views.

headline.main: Resist Call of Marriage for Gays, Mormon Leader Says
headline.print_headline: Mormons Are Encouraged to Oppose Gay Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
